title: Foundational Experience
description: Gain experience in tech, design, or business. Understanding the software development lifecycle (SDLC) is key.

title: Associate Product Manager (APM)
description: Entry-level PM role. Gather requirements, write user stories, and work closely with engineering and design teams.

title: Product Manager
description: Own a product feature or segment. Define strategy, metrics (KPIs), and drive product growth.

title: Senior Product Manager
description: Manage complex products or multiple product lines. Mentor junior PMs and influence company strategy.

title: Director of Product / CPO
description: Lead the entire product organization. Align product strategy with business goals. Executive decision making.
